de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card

Class CardConnectionDetector<R extends CardConnectionDetector.Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intarsys.security.smartcard.card.CardConnectionDetector<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - 

    public class CardConnectionDetector<R extends CardConnectionDetector.Result>
extends java.lang.Object
    Connect to all available terminals and return the ICardConnection that match the given filter.
